documentVerification.title: Document Verification
documentVerification.uploadInfo: Upload a government-issued ID to verify your identity.
documentVerification.acceptedDocuments: We accept passports, driver's licenses, and national ID cards.
importantPoints: Your ID will be scanned for personal data extraction.
Please provide the original ID; copies or screenshots are not accepted.
Ensure all information is visible; damaged or expired IDs are not accepted.

livenessVerification.title: Liveness Verification
livenessVerification.description: This step helps us confirm that you're a real person. Follow the simple instructions to complete the verification.
livenessVerification.cameraRequired: Camera and connection are required for liveness verification.
livenessVerification.startCamera: Click the button below to start camera verification
livenessVerification.privacyNote: Privacy Note: Your webcam data is processed securely and locally. No video is stored, only verification results.
